## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                       | Type                                | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | --------- |
| `label`  | `label`   | The toggle label                                                                  | `string`                            | `"Label"` |
| `space`  | `space`   | The state of the toggle. Whether is disabled or not. Possible values: false, true | `"l" \| "m" \| "s" \| "xl" \| "xs"` | `"xs"`    |
